summary: Based on GoldED from Amiga. Using low contrast colors to avoid flicking effects.
name: golded.vim
description:
/!\ GVIM ONLY /!\

I made this color scheme cause I'm a Web developper and I switch all the time between light and dark windows. This color scheme uses a set of low contrast colors.
Initially made for PHP, i'm using it with REBOL and D without problems.

screen: http://artin.la.pppppute.yom.be/public/www.vim.org/golded.png
install_details: Place the golded.vim file in the directory "~/.vim/colors" or "program files\vim\vimfiles\colors\". Type ":colo golded" to apply the color scheme.
